article_title: Using Your 401(k) To Fund Your Business

article_metadata.description: Mike Pred has led a successful career in Corporate America, with his latest position being the vice president of worldwide operations at Immucor. But when he left the firm last year, he wanted to try something new…that is, something entrepreneurial… So he looked at buying a franchise and saw that PrideStaff [...]
